select bom.idnrk, bom.maktx, bom.lgort, org1.label_cn logName, sup.lifnr, sum(nvl(sup.car_num,0)) complete_num, sum(planbom.car_num) car_num, sup.lifnr_name, org.label_cn deptName, planbom.msehl from zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, zg_t_bom bom, fw_employee em, fw_organization org, fw_organization org1 where org1.cuid=bom.lgort and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and em.cuid=carplan.car_user and em.org_id=org.cuid and planbom.bom_id=bom.cuid
and planbom.cuid = carbom.order_planbom_id and sup.car_bom_id = carbom.cuid and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.order_plan_type ='3'
group by bom.idnrk, bom.maktx, bom.lgort, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name,org.label_cn, org1.label_cn, planbom.msehl

select count(1) from ( select 1 from zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, zg_t_bom bom, fw_employee em, fw_organization org, fw_organization org1 where org1.cuid=bom.lgort and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and em.cuid=carplan.car_user and em.org_id=org.cuid and planbom.bom_id=bom.cuid
and planbom.cuid = carbom.order_planbom_id and sup.car_bom_id = carbom.cuid and sup.car_num>0 and carplan.car_state='8' and carplan.order_plan_type ='3'
group by bom.idnrk, bom.maktx, bom.lgort, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name,org.label_cn, org1.label_cn,planbom.msehl)
